TopicTitle: Rate That User Title (With a detailed reason)

Articles.Content:
1/10

I have OCD and like cleanliness so NO! I gave you one for having a title.
10/10 for taking up the fight in a worthy cause.
9/10 LOL is this associated with the creepy image thread or something?
7/10 It's...interesting.

6/10 i am not sure how to react to that especially with that avatar.....

also about curing kessler syndrome, i know its a joke but you know you can set persistent debris in settings to zero to cure it right?

7/10

With that avatar it is very suiting, even more so with KSP.

10/10

I love a good extradimensional Swiss Army knife.
9/10 because you are openly stating your gender and are of braving.
9/10 because that title with that picture is perfect.
8/10. I don't get the reference, but the mental image of a Lord of Eggnog is amusing to me.
7/10 makes my question whose delight that you are directing....
10/10 for fat people!
8/10 implying my emoji rockets will fail.
10/10 So funny.

1/10. No one hates mud. They just don't come here to read about it.

Imagine I start professing my love of cotton candy. It's in my user title, my signature, I change my username to involve cotton candy, I somehow manage to reference cotton candy in about one of every three posts I make. People would quickly start to complain that I'm filling up the forum with off-topic cotton candy chatter, even if they like cotton candy, because this isn't a forum about cotton candy. It would be foolish for me to accuse those people of hating cotton candy when they aren't complaining about cotton candy at all, just about me spamming up the place with cotton candy references.

(Red Iron Crown, thank you for writing that post, now I don't have to )

10/10

Unique, stands out for some weird reason.

(Oh, I don't know, maybe the HUGE GREEN REP BAR under it )
Master of the Fleets also a dragon 10/10.1
8/10 When have you been Presidential. Do you serve a term once every few hundred years?
4/10 Nose cones are unnecessary in the current aerodynamic model
8/10. Now modded like the rest of us.
4/10 I would have assumed you were the "King of the Red Iron Country" or something.
5/10 It's your avatar.

Advertising

5/10

But, how would you fit in the escape pods?

Anyway, it's quite good. 7/10
9/10 It fits your avatar the best.
